name: Inventory System Demo
description:
An Inventory System I made to showcase my progress with UE4 Blueprints. Includes a drag and drop system with basic quests, NPCs and Chests.

All Inventory and quest functionality was done from scratch, I just started with the First Person Template. All visuals aside from Inventory UI, such as Models were taken from the Unreal Marketplace. UI prompts were downloaded from https://thoseawesomeguys.com/prompts/
